attributes.action: Change the nomination system to allow a bulk nomination for WW1 & WW2 veterans
attributes.additional_details: The unselfish sacrifices made in WW1 & WW2
attributes.background: The nomination systems require an individual nomination per person. This petition would seek to amend that so all WW1 & WW2 service veterans (living and dead) can be “bulk nominated” for a unique “Freedom of Britain” medal and/or MBE at least.
